name: io.github.cyanheads/git-mcp-server
description: Comprehensive Git MCP server enabling native git tools including clone, commit, worktree, & more.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_TRANSPORT_TYPE
environmentVariables.description: Specifies the transport mechanism for the server.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Sets the minimum log level for output (e.g., 'debug', 'info', 'warn').

environmentVariables.name: GIT_SIGN_COMMITS
environmentVariables.description: Set to 'true' to enable GPG/SSH signing for commits made via the git_commit tool.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_TRANSPORT_TYPE
environmentVariables.description: Specifies the transport mechanism for the server.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_HTTP_PORT
environmentVariables.description: The port to run the HTTP server on.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_HTTP_HOST
environmentVariables.description: The host interface for the HTTP server.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_HTTP_ENDPOINT_PATH
environmentVariables.description: The HTTP endpoint path for MCP requests.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Sets the minimum log level for output (e.g., 'debug', 'info', 'warn').

environmentVariables.name: GIT_SIGN_COMMITS
environmentVariables.description: Set to 'true' to enable GPG/SSH signing for commits made via the git_commit tool.
